DOC.brief_summary: This study assess initial safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics MK-8655 , single multiple daily oral administration participant Type 2 Diabetes ( T2DM ) . The study assess reduction fast plasma glucose concentration baseline multiple daily administration MK-8655 .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics MK-8655 Participants With Type 2 Diabetes ( MK-8655-002 AM1 )
